name: Realm Engine | Virtual Tabletop
description:
What is Realm Engine?

in short ... it's a 3D Multiplayer Virtual Tabletop


Realm Engine is a system-agnostic Tabletop world builder that supports both building and running the role-playing game of your choice.

This Application allows images of created maps to be exported for easy integration if your party members utilise other gaming platforms. 

Hundreds of high-quality assets to support a wide variety of campaign styles from arid deserts to ocean-based campaigns allow you to build a large array of different map styles.
Supporting multiple tools such as snapping enabled objects, dynamic lights, animated spells, status effects and many more to come!

Features:



Take your town to the next level! Whether it's making and furnishing each room in a crowded Inn or mapping out a large village for a chase scene, Realm Engine has you covered. With a base world of 250 X 250 and unlimited size for Elite Edition, your possibilities are endless.


From desk lamps to cauldrons even the entire sun! Dynamic lighting allows you to create realistic scenes where you as the game master can control all light levels seen by the players. Controls for each light allow the player to interact dynamically with there environment and can help to set the mood for your adventures.


Set the scene with Dynamic weather.  You're in control. make it sunny and clear or foggy and raining with a slider control for weather intensity. Make sure your party pack a coat!


 3D Dynamic fog of war allows you to limit the view of the party because sometimes its fun to get lost in the dark.


**This feature is still in development and available for beta testing via our Patreon
 Play with friends online and take your party to the depths of the darkest dungeons with chat logs, individual miniatures, character portraits and screen themes each player will have their very own setup for each of their characters.


Build mountains, valleys, rivers, islands and so much more with the in-game terrain sculptor which automatically calibrates the texture of cliffs, valleys and overhangs


Don't feel like sculpting? that's fine randomly generate unlimited possibilities of Mountains, islands, towns and more with a single click.


 Tabletop screen support allows those who have a screen or projector to extend a player view of realm engine onto a second monitor. You can set a field of view and even split the screen into two for when the party inevitably splits up.

Full Features List:

  • Hundreds of place-able assets with more to come over time
  • Day and Night cycle
  • Dynamic Lighting 
  • Dynamic fog of war
  • Grid and Grid-less play.
  • Multiple biomes to choose from
  • Procedural terrain generator 
  • Terrain sculpting and painting 
  • Local Tabletop screen support.
  • Second screen Multiple views 
  • Import your own miniatures.**
  • Import your own audio 
  • Import 2D images 
  • Share your maps on the Steam workshop 
  • In game Web browser for your Gm resources
  • Real-time weather & environment 
  • Animated spells
  • Export hi-resolution images for other virtual tabletops
  • Over 100 audio tracks to mix 
  • hundreds of Momentary audio effects **
  • In game chat + Dice log 
  • Dice roller 
  • Multiple Game Master world-building.**
  • Multiple level building support allows hiding and displaying individual layers of Dungeons.
  • Third person top-down and Free view
  • Ocean Campaign support
  • Save and load multiple maps
  • Online multiplayer support **
    **This feature is still in development and available for beta testing via our Patreon
